name: Granbull
description: Because its fangs are too heavy, it always keeps its head tilted down. However, its bite is powerful.

attacks.name: Timid Tackle
attacks.effect: Granbull does 20 damage to itself. Switch Granbull with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Chomp
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Granbull.
